title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, it beeps. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also produces the same bell sound.
EB: I expect there to be no beeping sound when choosing SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText. Clicking on other buttons should not produce the bell sound either.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText application.
2. Choose SWT.MULTI option.
3. Click on other buttons in the application.
